description.value: You have large and extended tuft feathers that drape down to your shins. By ruffling your feathers, you can widen your feathers together and close any gaps to act as a parachute. So long as you are not @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.3CQC3JEY2C3Y721F]{Incapacitated}, you can land on your feet and prevent yourself from taking falling damage when falling.
